Title: Provides for the enrollment of certain persons in direct deposit for compensation payments
Summary: Provides for the enrollment of a surviving spouse, a surviving domestic partner, a dependent child or children, or any other person entitled to a death benefit in direct deposit for compensation payments.
LawCode: Amd ยง25, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to providing for the enrollment of certain persons in direct deposit for compensation payments
